item.description: November 5th Sign Bomb is On!!! Thousands will be pouring into Rentschler Field in East Hartford and we are going to seize the opportunity to spread the message of Liberty. The plan is to sign / banner wave / handout slim jim's / dvd's from 9am until kickoff. We can use the game time for a meeting, and if the numbers and interest are there possibly have a second afternoon sign wave as fans exit in the afternoon (around 3:30 - 4:00). Look for the Ron Paul signs - or call 860-730-3RON for updates. If no one answers the greeting will have details. Thank you to Douglas Weidl for suggesting this idea!
item.name: Ron Paul Sign Bomb November 5th
